title: ManArrow
author: ManArrow
content: Let's Talk about upcoming Trading Analysis for futures trading. Here is the First one. I'm gonna short AVAX once reach to 16.50https://i.imgur.com/ADVA2mR.jpg

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Seems like it already hit the target price, but you haven't told us what leverage you are using so that we know what your liquidation price is.What is your stop loss? Take profit? Risk Reward ratio?

comments.author: ManArrow
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on July 02, 2022, 08:40:10 PMSeems like it already hit the target price, but you haven't told us what leverage you are using so that we know what your liquidation price is.What is your stop loss? Take profit? Risk Reward ratio?I'm using 10X some time I use 20X and if I trade 20X my target would be around 15% 20% profit of the margin. SL Would be near recent support resistance line the entry point and my target was done for AVAX https://s3.tradingview.com/snapshots/3/31uIzPqV.png
